name: postgrest-parser
description: PostgREST URL-to-SQL parser with WASM bindings for TypeScript/JavaScript

scripts.build: wasm-pack build --target web --out-dir pkg -- --features wasm && bash scripts/post-build.sh
scripts.test:e2e: npm run build && cd pkg && npm pack --pack-destination ../e2e && cd ../e2e && npm install ./postgrest-parser-*.tgz && node test.mjs && rm -f postgrest-parser-*.tgz
scripts.test:e2e:npm: cd e2e && npm install postgrest-parser@latest && node test.mjs
